name: Essl Minutes wise
script:
# Run the near real-time tick every minute (Option B)
# NOTE: Server Script safe_exec does not allow frappe.get_attr; use frappe.call.
out = frappe.call(
    "bwm_custom.essl_sync.sync_realtime_tick",
    overlap_seconds=90,
    backfill_minutes_if_empty=10,
    preview=0
)

# (optional) quick console log to see a summary in scheduler output
frappe.errprint({
    "from": out.get("from"),
    "to": out.get("to"),
    "counts": out.get("counts", {}),
    "result": out.get("result")
})
